Bollihope Carrs Fell Race

Saturday 11th December 2021

Entry List
ENTER ONLINE
Entries Open
Tuesday 19th October 2021
Entries Close
Thursday 9th December 2021 at 23:00
Entries so Far
45 Participants
Entry Fees

FRA Member  £6
Non-Member  £7
Contact
Andy Blackett
Email
andyblackett@googlemail.com
Website
https://www.durhamfellrunners.org/bollihope-carrs/

To enter you must first Log In or Register your Details with SiEntries.

Bollihope Carrs is a new medium length (BM) fell race, 11km 380m+.

11am start, registration from 10am.

The start is from Bollihope Quarry car park, 3km South West of Frosterley in Weardale, Co. Durham.
What3Words: invest.because.octagon,

The races starts west along the river before climbing up rough ground to the summit of Bollihope Carrs, then descending East to the summit of Catterick before a quick descent back to the start.  

Full FRA Kit is required.  Map (provided), compass, whistle, hat, gloves, waterproof jacket with hood and taped seams, waterproof trousers with taped seams.

Given the terrain and time of year conditions may be challenging and the route may be prone to sudden weather changes - the effect may be significant. Route is unmarked, map and compass navigation will be required in poor visability.  No GPS for navigation.

Limit of 50 entries available.

This race is organised by Durham Fell Runners and licensed and supported by the FRA, please consider joining the FRA to support the organisation and receive a discount on future race entries.
